title: Banned for Botting?
body:
Hi there,

So I haven't played league in a long time and when I tried to login yesterday it said my account got banned and to check the emails. I logged into my emails to see that the reason for the ban was botting. I never used bots. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 
Looking on google there looks to be lots of people that were banned for this 4-5 months ago. Is logging a support ticket via support@riotgames.com best way to get this resolved?

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey there,

I know im a bit late with a reply here, however your best bet at contesting your ban would be to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support directly, yes.
